item.description: Gox # Composable pure function view layer You can use any HTML element as Go func Advice Use import alias import . “github.com/daarlabs/arcanum/gox” Be careful with naming convention to prevent HTML nodes names collisions Sample code # package app import ( . "github.com/daarlabs/arcanum/gox" ) func Page() string { return Render( Html( Lang("en"), Head( Title(Text("Example app")), ), Body( H1(Text("Example page")), P(Text("Example paragraph")), ), ), ) } Render # Render function transform Gox nodes to string
